'''''Mavin's create volcano''''' was an [[arcanist]] spell of [[Epic magic|epic power]] created in the days of [[Netheril]].

Effects.Drawbacks: The spell was never cast in Netherilâ€š but every arcanist sought the knowledge to conjure a devastating volcano, but they were stilted due to the terrifying effects the spell would have had on the ground-dwelling creatures, such as [[dwarf|dwarves]] and [[elf|elves]].

document_data.Components: The components needed for this spell were a mantle of sewn [[diamond]]s which acted like a [[ring of fire resistance]], a [[helm of brilliance]], and a [[mythallar]], which was placed at the location of the volcano.
document_data.History: The spell was created by [[Mavin]] around {{Yearlink|-601}} (3258 NY). This spell could no longer be cast due to the restrictions placed on magic by [[Mystra]] after the near cataclysmic destruction of the [[Weave]] by the casting of ''[[Karsus's avatar]]'' in {{Yearlink|-339}} (3520 NY). Later ages remembered the spell simply as '''''create volcano'''''.<ref >
